parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: One of the following principal axes: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: An array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of Axis

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IMassProperty.SetOverridePrincipleAxesOrientation
description: Overrides the orientation of the specified principal axis of inertia for the model currently being edited in this part or assembly document.
signature:
System.Boolean SetOverridePrincipleAxesOrientation( 
   System.Int32
Axis
,
   System.Object
Value
,
   System.Int32
Config_option
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: One of the following principal axes: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: An array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of Axis

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: True if orientation of principal axis is overridden, false if not
